content.text: Hey there , what are you up to?
I'm planning on going to Comic Con today!
Oh that's cool! Have you been to one before?
Yep, I've been to a few. I love dressing up and going to the panels.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about Comic Con?
I love seeing all the creative cosplays. And I always get really excited to meet my favorite authors and artists.
Sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go. Do you have a favorite character?
My favorite character is Harley Quinn. She's so badass!
Harley Quinn is so cool! I love her style.
Me too! I love her outfit and her personality.
Do you ever dress up as her?
I have a few times! But I'm not very good at sewing, so my costumes are never very accurate.
That's still really cool! I bet you look great.
Thanks! I'm not sure if I'm going to dress up this year, but I'm definitely going to go to the con.
Have fun! I wish I could go with you.
Thanks! I'll try to take some pictures and send them to you.
Awesome! I can't wait to see them.
